Articles.Content:
I am building a lander (unmanned) to go to laythe. I have set mechjeb's maneuver planner to do an interplanetary transfer to jool so I can make a hofman transfer to laythe. I am using the NearFuturePropulsion's Gyro-Quad Hall Thruster. When I use autostage, It immediately skips the Gyro-Quad Hall thruster and goes to the next stage. HELP!

For reference, here is a complete list of mods I am running:

AnimatedDecouplers

Crossfeed Enabler (included with NearFuturePropulsion)

Klockeed Martian Special Parts

Circular Solar Panels (Lionhead Aerospace, Inc.)

MechJeb 2

MechJeb Embedded Universally

ModuleManager 2.5.1 (included with NearFuturePropulsion)

NearFuturePropulsion

Procedural Fairings

RealChute

and last but not least...

SDHI Service Module System
